name: Bull Riding Challenge - Version PC
description:
In the video game "Bull Riding Challenge", you play as a bull rider who has to stay on the bulls for the longest time to get the best score.

You will be able to send your score and see your rank in the world ranking.

You will have to collect gold coins in the shape of a bull's head to unlock equipment, game modes and new bulls to fight.

Earn all the belt buckles in the game by successfully completing the challenges in challenge mode.

In order to stay on the bull for the longest time, you will have to press lighted buttons that appear randomly on the left and right side of the screen.

As time goes by, the buttons will appear and disappear more and more quickly.

When the bar on the top left is filled with red, the bull will succeed in ejecting you and the game will be over.

[Available on android and iphone too]
